name: KandyandChromeRadio
0:
”Alexa, open candy chrome radio”
”Alexa, start candy chrome radio”
”Alexa, ask candy chrome radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: candy chrome radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Introducing Kandy and Chrome Radio, your ultimate destination for the best Rare Old School, Funk, and oldies music, broadcasting 24/7 worldwide. This exceptional radio station is brought to you by LoCompany Studios, LLC., a renowned media production company.

Kandy and Chrome Radio is a haven for music enthusiasts who appreciate the timeless classics and groovy tunes that defined eras gone by. With a carefully curated playlist, this station guarantees an immersive experience that will transport you back in time, evoking nostalgia and memories.

Whether you're a fan of Rare Old School hits, Funk anthems, or oldies that never go out of style, Kandy and Chrome Radio has got you covered. From the infectious beats of Motown to the soulful melodies of the 70s and 80s, every track is handpicked to ensure an unforgettable musical journey.

Thanks to the dedication and expertise of Carlos Garcia Aceves, the mastermind behind this exceptional radio station, Kandy and Chrome Radio has become a go-to destination for music lovers worldwide. Carlos's passion for music and his commitment to delivering the best listening experience shines through in every broadcast.

So, tune in to Kandy and Chrome Radio and let the captivating sounds of Rare Old School, Funk, and oldies transport you to a bygone era. Experience the magic of music that transcends time and borders, brought to you by LoCompany Studios, LLC., and created by the talented Carlos Garcia Aceves.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
